q1.question: Please input the case number / name

q3.question:
Was the case resolved by any of 
Acquittal
Reversed on appeal, dismissed by DA
Dismissed on appeal
DNA dismissal 
Full pardon by governor 
Arrest, no charges filed
Under 18, full pardon
Identity theft

q4.question: Did this case resulted in conviction, dismissal, dismissal on deferred judgment, dismissed on completion of drug court
options: Dismissed on completion of drug court

q5.question: If applicable, have all treatment programs been completed? Say 'yes' if it does not apply

q6.question: What was the sentencing / probation completion date

q7.question: Have all fines, fees, and restitution been paid?

q8.question:
Does any of the following apply? 
SOL Expired 
DA has confirmed in writing they will not refile 
Case dismissed with costs, and costs paid or waived
